sentences.en: ‘Have you got a camera?’ ‘No.’ ‘You should buy one’ (= buy a camera ).
sentences.cn: “你有照相机吗？”“没有。”“你应该买一架。”

sentences.en: "It's not one of my favourite forms of music." — "No."
sentences.cn: “这不是我喜欢的音乐形式。”——“对，这不是。”

sentences.en: &B{what with one thing and another} she hadn't had much sleep recently.
sentences.cn: 她最近因为这样那样的事情而睡得不多。

sentences.en: Come back at one (= one o’clock ).
sentences.cn: 1点钟回来。

sentences.en: He hadn't eaten a thing except for one forkful of salad.
sentences.cn: 除了一餐叉色拉，他什么都没吃。

sentences.en: He is one of the most wanted criminals in Europe.
sentences.cn: 他是欧洲最重要的通缉犯之一。

sentences.en: he would one day be a great President.
sentences.cn: 他有一天会成为一位伟大的总统。

sentences.en: His gruff exterior concealed one of the kindest hearts.
sentences.cn: 他粗暴的外表下藏着一颗非常善良的心。

sentences.en: I don’t have any ones.
sentences.cn: 我没有一美元的纸币。

sentences.en: I for one am getting a little sick of writing about it.
sentences.cn: 仅就我来看，我开始有点厌恶写关于这件事的东西了。

sentences.en: I have $100m hidden away where no one will ever find it.
sentences.cn: 我把1亿美元藏到了一个永远没人会找到的地方。

sentences.en: I might buy one for a friend's birthday as a giggle.
sentences.cn: 我可能会买一件送给朋友当生日礼物，逗他开心。

sentences.en: I think I've got one of the most stressful jobs there is.
sentences.cn: 我想我得到的这份工作是其中最繁重的工作之一。

sentences.en: Katie’s almost one (= one year old ).
sentences.cn: 凯蒂快满一岁了。

sentences.en: Maria was talking baby talk to the little one.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚正用儿语和小家伙说话。

sentences.en: maybe we should talk to them one on one.
sentences.cn: 或许我们应该和他们当面谈谈。

sentences.en: not all instances fall neatly into one or another of these categories.
sentences.cn: 不是所有的情况都可清楚地归于这些类别中的某一类。

sentences.en: one after another the buses drew up.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车一辆接一辆地停下来。

sentences.en: one day a boy started teasing Grady.
sentences.cn: 一天，一个男孩开始取笑格雷迪。

sentences.en: one hundred and twenty-one pounds
sentences.cn: 121英镑

sentences.en: One of the office girls was down with the flu.
sentences.cn: 一位女职员得了流感。

sentences.en: The army is still one of the last male bastions.
sentences.cn: 军队仍然是男人占据的最后堡垒之一。

sentences.en: The children seemed upset. One was crying.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子好像不开心，有一个在哭。

sentences.en: the one and only Muhammad Ali.
sentences.cn: 独一无二的穆罕默德•阿里。

sentences.en: The room was quiet; no one volunteered any further information.
sentences.cn: 房间很安静，无人主动提供更多的信息。

sentences.en: the title of his one and only book.
sentences.cn: 他唯一的一本书的名字。

sentences.en: The train was crowded so we decided to catch a later one (= catch a later train ).
sentences.cn: 火车很挤，于是我们决定乘坐下一班。

sentences.en: there are one or two signs worth watching for.
sentences.cn: 有一些值得注意的标记。

sentences.en: these donations would be matched on a one-for-one basis with public revenues.
sentences.cn: 这些捐款将会与公共收入一对一匹配。

sentences.en: these donations would be matched on a one-for-one basis with public revenues.
sentences.cn: 这些捐款将会与公共收入一对一匹配。

sentences.en: They had alienated the one man who knew the business.
sentences.cn: 他们弄僵了同那个唯一懂行的人之间的关系。

sentences.en: They had one daughter.
sentences.cn: 他们有一个女儿。

sentences.en: Try to support each other when one of you is feeling down.
sentences.cn: 当有人觉得情绪低落时，要努力相互打气。

sentences.en: We are becoming one of the market leaders in the fashion industry.
sentences.cn: 我们正在成为时装业的领军者之一。

sentences.en: We are in one of the most severe recessions in modern times.
sentences.cn: 我们正在经历现代最严重的一段经济衰退。

words.tran_cn: 唯一的，仅有的；最合适的
统一性；单一性；同一性；完整

phrases.tran_cn: 仅就（某人）来看；举个例说
adv. 成为一体；[口]只试一次
adv. 接连地；一个接一个地
我们中的一个；我们的人；我们的支持者

phrases.phrase: one on one (或 one to one)

phrases.tran_cn: 一系列事物中的某一个
(非正式)这样那样的事（泛指许多事情）
老头子，父亲魔鬼；旧的那个

trans.tran_en: a piece of paper money worth one dollar

trans.tran_cn: 一个人，一点钟，一体，独一

trans.tran_en: used to mean someone or something of a type that has already been mentioned or is known about

trans.tran_cn: 一个人，任何人，本人，人家，东西
trans.tran_en: used to mean someone or something of a type that has already been mentioned or is known about
